  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingByteBufferView, SplicedByteBufferView

      • transferTo

        int transferTo(FileChannel fc,
               long offset)
        throws IOException
        Transfer the contents of this byte buffer view to the file channel passed in. Does not change the position of the file channel
        Parameters:
        fc - the file channel
        offset - the offset in the file channel
        Returns:
        the number of byte transferred to the filechannel
        Throws:
        IOException - on failure to write to the file channel

        ByteBufferView duplicate()
